document.id: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R21-021
document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R21-021
Adopting the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Sewer System Regulations
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 29th day of September, 2021, the following law was adopted:

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo") has received a grant for infrastructure improvement from the U.S. Department of Agriculture – Rural Development ("USDA-RD"); and,
the USDA-RD requires that the Pueblo have regulations in place relating to the sewer system operations and service as part of the grant requirements; and,

the Council reviewed and considered the attached "Pueblo de San Ildefonso Sewer System Regulations ("Sewer System Regulations") and has determined it is in the best interests of the Pueblo to authorize the Governor to adopt the proposed regulations.
that the Council hereby enacts the attached law entitled, "SEWER SYSTEM REGULATIONS AUTHORIZATION ACT."

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on September 29, 2021, at a meeting with a vote of 9 in favor, 0 opposed, 0 abstaining and 1 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.

text.strong: DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

procedural-data.text: Resolution No. SI-R21-021 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 29th day of September, 2021, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4(c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.

annotation.doc: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R21-021

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the "SEWER SYSTEM REGULATIONS AUTHORIZATIONS ACT."

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The Purpose of this Act is to authorize regulations pertaining to the operation and services for the Pueblo's sewer system.

para.text: "Act" means the "Sewer System Regulations Authorization Act.
"Pueblo" means the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
"USDA-RD" means the United States Department of Agriculture – Rural Development.

section.heading: Findings
section.text: The Council hereby finds and declares that:

para.text: The Pueblo has received a grant for infrastructure improvement from the USDA-RD; and
the USDA-RD requires that the Pueblo have regulations in place relating to the sewer system operations and service as part of the grant requirements; and

the Council reviewed and considered the attached Sewer System Regulations and has determined it is in the best interests of the Pueblo to authorize the Governor to adopt the proposed regulations in the same or similar form; and
The Council hereby authorizes the Governor to promulgate and adopt Sewer System
